lyric: 指挥 Conductor:栗田 博文 Hirofumi Kurita
乐队 Orchestra:東京フィルハーモニー交響楽団 Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra

舞台监督 Orchestra Stage Manager:稲岡 宏司 Hiroshi Inaoka
乐团经理 Orchestra Manager:岩崎 井織 Iori Iwasaki
录音现场指导 Scoring Sessions Director:宮野 幸子 Sachiko Miyano (SHANGRI-LA Inc.)
